reviewText: This movie tells the story of two best friends who mature with tragedies and triumphs. There are dual, intertwined plots, and incredible conflicts mixed with mystery. The acting is variable but mostly very good with some top stars in supporting roles. This movie keeps the viewer engaged from the first scene to the last. There is also an impressive soundtrack by Korngold that adds significantly to the feel of this movie. Every movie lover should see this film. Its a must see.
